1.content: Create new branch for modal development
1.details: Pull latest from main and create a new feature branch

2.content: Convert FAQ form to modal component
2.details: Transform src/components/contents/faq-form.tsx to use Dialog modal pattern with proper Zod validation like booking-modal.tsx

3.content: Convert Service form to modal component
3.details: Transform src/components/services/service-form.tsx to use Dialog modal pattern with proper Zod validation

4.content: Update pages to use new modal components
4.details: Update content page and services page to use the new modal components instead of inline forms

5.details: Test all modals work properly with validation, then commit and push to new branch
